[Buy](https://www.vitaeinternational.com/product/vitaminc-promotional-pack/) - VitaMinC®9,05 € - 24,50 € IVA Antioxidant power thanks to its highly absorbed vitamin C, green tea polyphenols and black pepper extract [Buy](https://www.vitaeinternational.com/product/vitaminc/) - Vitarlic Cardio26,82 € IVA Food supplement with aged garlic extract to prevent and treat cardiovascular diseases [Buy](https://www.vitaeinternational.com/product/vitarlic-cardio/) - Vitarlic Forte17,50 € - 27,73 € IVA Helps with protection against cardiovascular conditions thanks to the aged garlic extract [Buy](https://www.vitaeinternational.com/product/vitarlic-forte-kyolic/) - Vitarlic® Cleanse25,41 € IVA Facilitates detoxification of the hepatic system thanks to a unique combination of ingredients [Buy](https://www.vitaeinternational.com/product/vitarlic-cleanse/) - Vitatuss12,36 € IVA Respiratory health [Buy](https://www.vitaeinternational.com/product/vitatuss/) - Vitatuss Sticks12,36 € IVA Respiratory health [Buy](https://www.vitaeinternational.com/product/vitatuss-sticks/) Vitae Health Innovation is a laboratory of natural food supplements that was born in Barcelona in 1995 with the idea of its founder to find ingredients present in nature that enhance the proper functioning and homeostasis (balance) of the body. This laboratory of food supplements and natural products has the philosophy of achieving the physical and mental well-being of people. The basis of its work begins with the utmost respect for nature while offering effective and top quality products that help to self-regulate, strengthen and reinforce the body's balance in the most natural and physiological way possible. Vitae Health Innovation has a strong commitment to the planet and, in accordance with its bets, values for health, transparency and sustainability, trying to generate a positive impact. For this reason, we work on the design of healthy and environmentally friendly products and try to transfer these principles to all actions, from the smallest and most imperceptible to the largest and most notorious. The local and proximity production of the products, the use of sustainable packaging, the Clean Label on many of the products... are a clear example of this commitment. Vitae Health Innovation has a wide range of products that respond to the needs of people to improve their daily well-being.
